pkgmetadata.longdescription: Navigating mass spectral similarity in high-resolution MS/MS metabolomics data // MetCirc comprises a workflow to interactively explore high-resolution MS/MS metabolomics data: create an MSP object, a format for MS/MS library data, bin m/z values of precursors, calculate similarity between precursors based on the normalised dot product and visualise similarities in a circular layout. Within the interactive framework the user can annotate MS/MS features based on their similarity to (known) related MS/MS features.
